summary: This is an email forwarding a letter from defense attorney Roy Black regarding Jeffrey Epstein, sent to an Assistant U.S. Attorney. The sender notes it is unusual for Black to contact them directly and mentions a pending criminal complaint against the Rothstein firm and a voicemail from Brad Edwards.

persons.name: Roy Black
persons.context: Attorney for Jeffrey Epstein who sent a letter directly to the Assistant U.S. Attorney, which the sender finds unusual.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the letter from his attorney Roy Black.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: Left a voicemail for the sender regarding the case, which the sender has not yet responded to.

connections.description: Roy Black is identified as Jeffrey Epstein's defense attorney, sending correspondence on his behalf.

events.title: Letter from Roy Black forwarded
events.description: An email is sent forwarding a letter from defense attorney Roy Black regarding Jeffrey Epstein to an Assistant U.S. Attorney.

locations: 500 S. Australian Ave, Suite 400 West Palm Beach, FL 33401
keyFacts: Roy Black, Jeffrey Epstein's attorney, sent a letter directly to an Assistant U.S. Attorney, which the sender found unusual as Black typically contacts higher-ranking officials.
The sender references a pending criminal complaint against the Rothstein firm but has not yet seen it.
Brad Edwards left a voicemail for the sender, which had not been returned at the time of the email.
